TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EdmTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Base class for attributes that define how types in the object layer are mapped to entity types and complex types in the conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmEntityTypeAttribute> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmComplexTypeAttribute> are derived from EdmTypeAttribute.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: The name of the type in the conceptual schema that maps to the class to which this attribute is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The name of the type must correspond to the name of the entity type or complex type in the conceptual schema.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: The namespace name of the entity object type or complex type in the conceptual schema that maps to this type.
Docs.value: A that is the namespace name.
